title: Trying to identify this font
content:
Hello,

Would anyone know the identity of this font? All I know is that it is a free font.

Many thanks for any help you can offer.

Fred.

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [alward48\_image6.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828031605/http:/typophile.com/files/alward48_image6.jpg) | 27.28 KB |

 [‹ "Bodegas" - script font](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828031605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38388 "Go to previous forum topic") [Friedrich Air Conditioning old logotype ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080828031605/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38386 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredgassit

comments.content:
Hi there:

A modified Futura Extra Bold on a path?

Also have a look at Grenadine from MVB- this looks even closer. You have to lower the cross bar yourself though.

Mikey :-)

Hello Mikey,

Thanks for your quick response.

I’ll check them out ASAP.

Thanks again,  
Fred.
